TopicTitle: [Awnsered!] Why aren't files I upload to Curse working?

Articles.Content:
I don't know if this is the correct forum to put this in, but here's my problem:

The file i uploaded to Curse for a Curse project i made, (Drogue Chute Plus) (It has not been approved by a moderator, so you can't see it) was rejected because it said it has an "Invalid Archive". What in the world is an invalid archive? And if you're wondering what the file is, you can download it in the forum thing in my signature. Thanks in advance!

Edited June 15, 2014 by Nicholander
Try using a ZIP archive instead of RAR?

Hmmm... okay, I'll try it as a .zip

Edit: It seems to be working, thanks for the advice.

Edited June 15, 2014 by Nicholander
Added the edit thing
